caption.p: Impact of cost C on the final epidemic size ( R(∞)) and the peak fraction of hospitalized ( H(max)). ( a) Proportionality constant m = 0.0, 0.1, 0.5, 1.0, ( b) rate of testing r = 0.1, 0.5, 1.0, ( c) rate of hospital facilities h = 0.1, 0.5, 1.0 and ( d) rate of asymptomatic infection ρ = 0.1, 0.5, 1.0. All other parameters are as listed in table 1.
